entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.4°C

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
